text: ovunaṭa pera vū nūhgē janayā da ovunaṭa pasu vū saturu kaṇḍāyam da (ovungē daham dūtavarun) boru kaḷōya. sǣma samūhayakma tamangē daham dūtayāṇanva grahaṇaya kirīmaṭa tæt kaḷōya. tavada ovun satyaya vināśa karanu piṇisa asatyaya gena emagin tarka kaḷōya. eheyin mama ovun grahaṇaya kaḷemi. eviṭa māgē dan̆ḍuvama kesē vīda
